metadata.title: WD 500GB Berry My Passport Ultra Portable External Hard Drive - USB 3.0 - WDBWWM5000ABY-NESN
features: Secure portable storage with up to 2 TB capacity
Stylish design with a range of exciting colors
Formatted for Windows. For Mac compatibility this Hard Drive requires reformatting. Refer to Application Guide for guidance on this
description: Secure and dependable, My Passport Ultra can be trusted to safeguard your private files. Set an optional password, that only you know, to activate 256-bit hardware encryption to add an extra layer of security. Combined with WD Backup, our most powerful backup software yet, it's easier than ever to have a backup plan that fits your life.
